Title: Relates to the use of a vehicle as a weapon
Summary: Relates to the "Heather D. Heyer act" which increases penalties where a vehicle is used as a weapon in a hate crime and makes it illegal to travel upon a roadway in a vehicle within 1000 feet of a protest.
LawCode: Add ยง1229-e, V & T L; amd ยง485.10, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the penal law, in relation to the use of a vehicle as a weapon
